title: Randomness Example
subtitle: To make simulations repeatable just set *randomSeed* interactive property.
about: Click play and observe which atoms are being marked every 7ps. Note that each time you reload
the whole page, the atom placement and marking sequence will be exactly the same.
You can open browser console where you will see marked atoms indices.
To restore basic behavior of Math.random() remove *randomSeed* property. However note that
even when it's not present, the single simulation will be repeatable if you use tick history to
restore previous state and click *play* button again.
